summary: Ann L. Smith, born on December 1, 1972, is a 64-inch tall female weighing 74 kg. Her primary care physician is Bill D. McAllister, MD. Ann is currently taking albuterol and metformin, received Pfizer COVID-19 and Influenza A/B vaccines on January 1, 2022, and February 23, 2023, underwent an appendectomy on February 3, 1999, and a mastectomy on May 10, 2010. She has chronic conditions including hypertension (ICD-10: I10) and prediabetes (ICD-10: R73.09).
